title: Draft pick coming to normals?
body:
is the draft pick rank mode where you choose where you want to play coming to normals? i would like to practice ADC over and over against players but can never get the roles i want to learn but in the old team builder/draft pick i am able to.

are they looking at putting that mode into normals at all instead of blind bick?

replies.body:
Just instalock your champion then go fill top/mid/adc


Or play bots,
